error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'fingers' (10) was used instead of 'more_trombones' (2).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 25
Three fewer trumpets than Miles has fingers is 10-3=<<10-3=7>>7 trumpets.
Two more guitars than he has hands is 2+2=<<2+2=4>>4 guitars.
Two more trombones than he has heads is 10+1=<<10+1=11>>11 trombones.
And one fewer French horn than he has guitars is 4-1=<<4-1=3>>3 French horns.
Altogether, Miles owns 7+4+11+3=<<7+4+11+3=25>>25 musical instruments.
